aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys in the request

iotsitewise:assethierarchypath.description: Filters access by an asset hierarchy path, which is the string of asset IDs in the asset's hierarchy, each separated by a forward slash

iotsitewise:childassetid.description: Filters access by the ID of a child asset being associated whith a parent asset

iotsitewise:group.description: Filters access by the ID of an AWS Single Sign-On group

iotsitewise:iam.description: Filters access by the ID of an AWS IAM identity

iotsitewise:isassociatedwithassetpropert.description: Filters access by data streams associated with or not associated with asset properties

iotsitewise:portal.description: Filters access by the ID of a portal

iotsitewise:project.description: Filters access by the ID of a project

iotsitewise:propertyalias.description: Filters access by the property alias

iotsitewise:propertyid.description: Filters access by the ID of an asset property

iotsitewise:user.description: Filters access by the ID of an AWS Single Sign-On user
